text: On goh Alloh taolo kaloƣ [zoƣ]-ero firistod, ki dar zamin custucu [va kovis] mekard, to [kaloƣi murdaero dafn kunad va in guna] ʙa vaj nison dihad, ki ci guna casadi ʙarodarasro ʙipusonad. [Qoʙil] Guft: "Voj ʙar man! Ojo notavon ʙudam az in ki hamcun in kaloƣ ʙosam va casadi ʙarodaramro ʙipusonam"? On goh [ʙa saxti az kori zisti xes] pusajmon sud
